backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: adding 30 new certification images to CertificationsGallery component and configuring them as static assets in frontend/public/assets/.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing component purposes, including the CertificationsGallery with 54 total certification images and modal functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with custom design tokens for background, foreground, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, page title, root div, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that renders the complete portfolio layout including HeroSection, ProfessionalSummary, CoreCompetencies, Education, ProfessionalCertifications, ProfessionalExperience, ResearchPapers, Interests, CertificationsGallery, and Footer in sequence.
frontend/src/components/CertificateModal: Full-screen modal component for viewing certificate images with close button, previous/next navigation, keyboard shortcuts (Escape, ArrowLeft, ArrowRight), and accessible ARIA attributes.
frontend/src/components/CertificationsGa: Gallery component displaying 54 professional certification images in a responsive grid with hover effects and click-to-expand modal functionality using CertificateModal.
frontend/src/components/CoreCompetencies: Section component displaying nine core technical competencies in a responsive grid with icons, hover effects, and teal accent colors.
frontend/src/components/Education.tsx: Section component listing three educational qualifications in reverse chronological order with graduation cap icons and institution details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice, current year, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters derived from hostname.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the hero banner with Jerry Osiobe's headshot, name, professional credentials (MNSE, COREN), and contact information (email, phone, location) with animated background effects.
frontend/src/components/Interests.tsx: Renders a grid of personal interests (Reading, Learning, Swimming, Travelling, Football) with corresponding icons in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalCert: Displays categorized professional certifications across six domains: Engineering Memberships, Project & Risk Management, Data & AI, Cybersecurity, Process Improvement, and Technical Courses.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalExpe: Shows a timeline of six professional positions with company names, dates, and key responsibilities, including current role as Fabrication Engineer and previous positions in cybersecurity, data analysis, and network support.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalSumm: Presents a brief professional summary highlighting Jerry Osiobe's expertise in Materials & Metallurgical Engineering, Project Management, Cybersecurity, Data Analytics, and technical skills.
frontend/src/components/ResearchPapers.t: Lists five research papers/publications with titles and DOI links covering topics like CCTV systems, business continuity planning, and mathematical systems.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating that the portfolio uses static content without backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark theme color palettes (slate and teal), typography styles for headings and paragraphs, and a utility class for grid background patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, border radius variables, box shadows, and animation keyframes for accordions and other UI elements.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a professional portfolio website for Engr. Jerry Osiobe with sections for hero, summary, competencies, education, certifications, experience, publications, and interests, featuring timeline layouts and certification gallery.
